name: Bewitching Potions
description:
This is the story of Cecilia,a witch in-training trying to make the best potion in order to pass her witch exam.

To move around the map press A or D or left and right arrows

To jump press the SPACE button.

To collect the ingredients simply make Cecilia collide with them.

It literally takes few minutes to finish the level.

Still a project in development,more levels will be added in the future
